content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles at positions(-16.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 21.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-19.5, 22.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -49.0) and a furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0) to the assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to fuel availability
- Ensure to keep coal or other fuel sources in inventory to refuel the boiler. Check inventory regularly to avoid running out of fuel.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for obstructions in the vicinity of the intended placement.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all electric poles are correctly placed and connected to the power network. Ensure that entities requiring power are within range of a power source.
